template.description: This template gets the flights from the TCP/TLS connection from Firehose, filters the incoming data, transform them to NGSIV2 entities, and sends them to Orion.
template.name: Firehose-NGSI-Orion

config.comments: Get some entitie attributes for future processing (flightNumber, reg, route)
Save aircraft entity in Orion Context Broker

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

config.comments: Build some attributes related to the flight entity (flightNumber, reg)
Establish the connection with Plane Finder, authenticate the client, and extract the payload from received packages
Filter all the aircrafts whose flights departs from or arrives to Aberdeen Airport and whose "flightNumber" is not null
Build aircraft entity with NGSIv2 format
